description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Enterprise Manager for Oracle Database component in Oracle Enterprise Manager Grid Control EM Base Platform: 10.2.0.5, 11.1.0.1 EM DB Control: 11.1.0.7, 11.2.0.3, 11.2.0.4 EM Plugin for DB: 12.1.0.4, 12.1.0.5, and 12.1.0.6 allows remote authenticated users to affect integrity via unknown vectors related to Content Management.
